WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 22 OCT
   BY M/V BGP CHALLENGER TOWING 12000 METER LONG CABLE
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   27-27.02S 041-08.16W, 26-21.96S 042-42.00W,
   26-36.27S 043-00.67W, 27-29.56S 041-44.31W.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2630/16.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 23 OCT 16.
